text: Gulf of Cazones, or Golfo de Cazones in Spanish is a large gulf in South Cuba located around the Cuban Provinces of Matanzas and Cienfuegos. It is considered unsafe for ships to sail on because of calms and cross currents. == History == The Bay of Pigs Invasion in 1961 was a failed attempt of invasion by a group of Cuban counter-revelutionaries, paid and trained by the United States to replace Fidel Castro's leftist government. Category:Gulfs of North America Category:Bodies of water of North America Category:Geography of Cuba
title: Gulf of Cazones
